sqls.sql: SELECT app.id, app.APPLICATION_NO, app.APP_TYPE, app.SERVICE_ID, app.LICENCE_ID, app.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID, app.BASE_APP_ID, app.BASE_LICENCE_ID, app.NEED_INSPECTION, app.STATUS, app.APP_GRP_ID, app.CREATED_DT, app.CREATED_BY, app.UPDATED_DT, app.UPDATED_BY FROM APPLICATION AS app WHERE 1=1 <#if APPLICATION_NO??> AND CHARINDEX(:APPLICATION_NO, app.APPLICATION_NO) >0</#if> <#if STATUS??> AND app.STATUS = :STATUS</#if> <#if APP_TYPE??> AND app.APP_TYPE = :APP_TYPE</#if>

select chkl.id as config_id, item_pool.id as item_id, chkl.is_common as common, chkl.svc_code as svc_code, hs.svc_name as svc_name, chkl.svc_subtype_name as svc_subtype_name, chkl.module as module, chkl.[type] as svc_type, chkl.hci_code as hci_code, sec.section_name as section_name, sec.section_desc as section_desc, sec.[order] as section_order, item_pool.question as checklist_item, item_pool.answer_type, item_pool.risk_level as risk_level, regulation.clause_no as clause_no, regulation.clause as clause from chkl_config_hcsa_service chkl inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_section sec on chkl.id = sec.chkl_config_id inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_section_item sec_item on sec_item.section_id = sec.id inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_item_pool item_pool on sec_item.item_id = item_pool.id inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_regulation regulation on item_pool.regulation_id = regulation.id left join hcsa_service hs on hs.svc_code = chkl.svc_code where 1=1 <#if svc_code??> and chkl.svc_code in (:svc_code)</#if> <#if svc_type??> and chkl.[type] = :svc_type</#if> <#if common??> and chkl.is_common = :common</#if> <#if configId??> and chkl.id = :configId</#if>
